newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Rock Building Society plans buyback.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Rock Building Society plans buyback.

text.p: The Rock Building Society said on Tuesday it would seek shareholder approval to buy back up to 10 percent of its shares currently on issue.

"Directors believe that the buy-back strategy will provide the Society with an opportunity to increase shareholder value in the medium term," chairman of directors Robert South told the annual meeting.
Directors would determine the timing, pricing and number of shares to be acquired under the buy-back strategy, taking into account the current share price and market conditions.
The maximum number of Rock shares the society may acquire under the buy-back scheme is 1,723,321.
Rock Building Society shares were one cent firmer at A$2.56 at 11.40 a.m. (0140 GMT).
